# Formatting Prompt for Selected Documents

When working with the specified documents, please follow these instructions to minimize code styling-related warnings and messages:

## Scope
- Only apply formatting changes to the documents explicitly selected by the user.
- Do not modify or suggest changes to any other files.

## Formatting Guidelines
- Strictly adhere to the code style and formatting rules defined in the `.editorconfig` file at the root of the solution.
- Ensure consistent indentation, spacing, and line breaks as per project standards.
- Correct any styling issues such as trailing whitespace, inconsistent brace placement, or improper naming conventions.

## Comments & Documentation
- Do not add or modify comments or documentation unless requested.
- Focus solely on formatting and style corrections.

## Output
- Provide a brief summary of the formatting changes made.
- Do not include unrelated suggestions or code modifications.
